zc.thread
Interface Channel

All Known Implementing Classes:
Port, SynchronousChannel
public interface Channel

Interface for message passing conduit between two threads.

Method Summary
 java.lang.Object receive()
          Wait for a message from the other side of this Channel.
 void send(java.lang.Object inMessage)
          Send the message to the other side of this Channel.
 

Method Detail

send

public void send(java.lang.Object inMessage)
          throws java.lang.InterruptedException
Send the message to the other side of this Channel.
Parameters:
inMessage - the message to send (null is not allowed).
Throws:
java.lang.InterruptedException - if the calling thread is interrupted while waiting.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if inMessage is null.

receive

public java.lang.Object receive()
                         throws java.lang.InterruptedException
Wait for a message from the other side of this Channel. The Receiver is blocked until a message is sent from the other side of this Channel.
Returns:
an Object the message received (null object is not possible).
Throws:
java.lang.InterruptedException - if the calling thread is interrupted while waiting.
